typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item_category_name as string,
		item_category_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srcItemCategories
source(output(
		item_name as string,
		item_id as string,
		item_category_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srcItems
srcItemCategories derive(item_category_id = toInteger(item_category_id)) ~> drvItemCategories
srcItems derive(item_id = toInteger(item_id),
		item_category_id = toInteger(item_category_id)) ~> drvItems
drvItems, drvItemCategories join(drvItems@item_category_id == drvItemCategories@item_category_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> jnItems
